name: Roy Tang
text: Note that I already have a laptop with relatively good specs (not top end, but ok); that's not what I'm looking for here, the focus of the reqt is on mobility.    @Paul - the alienware m11x retails here for 70+k I'm not going to spend that much and I'm not specifically looking for a gaming machine, I already have a desktop for that. You basically recommended a laptop that YOU want.  :p    @Rumz - <30k is good; 30-40k can be considered depending on value. Is there a specific model of thinkpad you recommend?    @Clement - "coding" here really just means it should have a sensible keyboard I won't have trouble typing with.  :D    @Morris - any specific model you think is ok? The inexpensive part is hard, but in theory pwede din kahit slightly used.
